summary:
👋Hey there! Want to get to know me, what I did, and what I learned? Keep reading! 

👨‍🎓From 2014-2020 - I did my bachelors in Marketing & Sales (Commerciële Economie) and Masters in Business Administration (MSc BA). I travelled to Norway and the United States for my internship and graduating assignment

💯Nice! Because I learned fluent Norwegian and English in speaking, writing and reading. 

🇳🇴From 2019-2020 - I moved to Norway and improved my Norwegian to become even more fluent and understand it's culture. I led a team of warehouse and construction workers to improve it's internal processes. 

I learned what it's like to work with people from 5-7 different cultures. Takeaway? Do not judge! 

🚀From 2020-2022 - I founded Avensi after 5 years of experience with selling on Amazon. Avensi helped brands sell on Amazon. I learned what it's like to run a business and all aspects that come with it! 

✅During these years, I have seen many different cultures, learned fluently speak two new languages, did lots of sales calls with (potential) clients, hired a team to outsource some work and learned more about sales funnels, sales strategies, marketing strategies, online marketing, advertising, copywriting, integration softwares, API connections, building a website, teambuilding, SOP's and much more.     

🎁In 2022, I asked myself: "where do I want to be in 5-10 years?" 

💪I like to work with and being around other people. I get energy from renewing and changing circumstances and I like to develop, design and implement new projects. 

📈New Business Development - With this in mind, I have chosen to work for Nedap. Starting as in Inside Sales Specialist where my responsibilities and results lie in New Business Development - Lead Qualification & Lead Conversion. 

Lead Qualification - Qualifying and converting marketing qualified leads into sales qualified leads

Lead Conversion - Converting sales qualified leads into happy customers. 

✅ My foundation for this have been Consultative Selling Techniques as I love to listen, help and advise rather than to talk and to push.

education.degree_name: MSc BA - Master of Science in Business Administration

education.field_of_study: Marketing  / Commerciële economie (CE) - Specialisatie marketing management

profile_positions.description:
⚡️Responsibilities⚡️ 

As the Partner Experience Specialist I am responsible for creating and maintaining a positive experience for partners. This includes developing and designing new initiatives, implementing them, and then transferring them to management and execution. 

This includes identifying, analysing and improving existing and new processes which contain customer (partner) contact. Examples are: 

- Order-to-cash - what happens when we receive an order until we get the cash, what are friction points in this process and how can we improve them?
- Partner discount strategy - is our discount strategy legitimate and in line with revenue generated from our customers/partners?
- Partner experience / client journey survey - after identifying possible friction points, we have to validate them with our customers and work on improving the partner experience
- Commercial process - what does our commercial process look like and how can we implement and improve our CRM in this process?
- Customer communication - how do we communicate updates and improvements of our products, processes,  inventory, etc. to our customers and how can we improve this?

Overall, as I am responsible for improving current, identifying and creating new processes relation to customer/partner experience.

-----

⚡️ Skills⚡️ 

Required and further developed: 

- Analytical
- Commercial awareness
- Communication
- Collaboration and connection
- Leadership
- Teamwork

-----
profile_positions.title: Partner Experience Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As an Inside Sales Specialist, my responsibilities were as following: 

1. New business development - Lead qualification:
A) Converting Marketing qualified leads into sales qualified leads;
B) Gather information of the background and identify current situation, desired situation and pain points.

2. New business development - Lead conversion:
A) Converting sales qualified leads into happy customers using consultative selling techniques;
B) Pro-actively claim and promote our position in the East-European market.

3. Strategy formulation:
A) How can we make inside sales scalable?
B) How can we duplicate and transferable to other regions/people?
C) What should be done to make CRM and PowerBI support our processes better?
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales Specialist

profile_positions.description:
🚀 Ik heb een enorme passie om nieuwe bedrijven te leren kennen en hun helpen na te denken over hun Amazon strategie. Wat voor mij ooit is begonnen als stage-opdracht is nu een full-time business. Full time online (Amazon) marketeer met een focus op strategie en 𝐒𝐄𝐎 voor Amazon en bovendien eigenaar van online (Amazon) marketing bureau Avensi. Hier help ik bedrijven en merken om op Amazon beter zichtbaar te worden wat resulteert in meer verkopen.

Actief voetballer, hardloper, mountainbiker en avonturier.

🚀 [Avensi.nl](http://avensi.nl/) 📊 📈
Avensi helpt merken groeien op Amazon. Strategie, SEO, Marketing, Advertising, Logistiek (FBA), enzovoorts. Alles wat er voor Amazon bij komt kijken zijn wij in gespecialiseerd. Door mijn jarenlange ervaring met verkopen op Amazon weet ik precies wat nodig is om te scoren.

🚀 ERVARING & EXPERTISE
7 jaar ervaring in Amazon SEO / Marketing / Advertising / Logistiek (FBA) / Strategie

Ook de merk-gerelateerde programma's (A+ content / Brand Store / Video advertising / Sponsored Brands) van Amazon kennen voor mij weinig geheimen.

🚀 WAT KAN IK VOOR JOU DOEN?
Ik help bedrijven onder andere met:

- Lanceren en onderhouden van producten op Amazon
- Inrichten en onderhouden van jullie middleware (bijv. Channable)
- Amazon SEO optimalisatie
- Amazon Strategieplanning
- Amazon Brand Store
- Amazon A+ content
- Amazon Advertising
- Amazon FBA

Benieuwd naar wat Avensi voor jou of je organisatie kan betekenen?
profile_positions.title: Business Owner

profile_positions.description:
For more than 4 years, I have been the project manager for building from scratch, optimizing, and maintaining sales for Horze branded products on Amazon Europe. How can you make sure that your products appear in top search results and become #1 selling in its category? Please let me tell you how. 

Just launching your products on Amazon does not guarantee you success. To succeed on Amazon, you need to optimize and advertise every single product while following a strategy that align your goals. This on-going/continues process takes time, especially in the beginning, but will give you the desired results. 

Are you interested in expanding your business to one of the worlds biggest e-commerce marketplaces? But you do not know how? Or you do not have the resources and knowledge available for it? Contact me today to figure out how you should engage this emerging market and become #1 in your category. 

I have 4+ years experience in: 
- Amazon product optimization
- Amazon Seller Central
- Amazon brand registration/policy
- Amazon brand strategy
- Amazon PPC
- Amazon advertising strategy
- Amazon marketing strategy
- Amazon organic search optimization
- Amazon keyword search

Some tools I have used during the years:
- Helium10
- Junglescout
- RepricerExpress
- FeedbackExpress
- Channable
profile_positions.title: Amazon Optimization Manager

profile_positions.description: Setting up and maintaining sales of Horze products on Amazon. Making strategic and analytical decisions depending on the current situation and the vision we strive for.
profile_positions.title: Internship Commerce

profile_positions.location: Greater New York City en omgeving, Verenigde Staten
profile_positions.description:
Looked into expenses from the sales department, made a complete and detailed overview of all 2017 expenses and developed a new, efficient expense reporting procedure which will give this detailed overview for upcoming years. 

Worked with the sales manager and helped managing the sales teams to increase their performance. Came up with and created a sales compendium which has all the main procedures and tactics. 

Was the project manager of launching and increasing sales on Amazon.com. Worked together with all departments to build a professional and fast emerging presence on Amazon.com.
profile_positions.title: Graduation Assignment Bachelor of Commerce / Project manager Amazon

profile_positions.description: Korte tijd als inpakmedewerker bij HST Groep in Enschede gewerkt. In de avonduren inkomende pakketen gesorteerd en ingepakt in de juiste stelling. Daarna klaarzetten voor verzending naar volgende locatie.
profile_positions.title: Inpakmedewerker
